verses.name: John 21:19
verses.text: This spake he, signifying by what death he should glorify God. And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him, Follow me.

verses.name: John 21:20
verses.text: Then Peter, turning about, seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following; which also leaned on his breast at supper, and said, Lord, which is he that betrayeth thee?

verses.name: John 21:21
verses.text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus, Lord, and what shall this man do?

verses.name: John 21:22
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee? follow thou me.
